name: Bean Adventures!
description:
IF THE WEBGL DOESNT WORK, CONSIDER DOWNLOADING THE GAME

STORYLINE

Bean is a very lonely bean, but tends to see the light and happiness in things.  Today is Bean's last day, where the world of beans starts to end. Help Bean journey through all the parkour, of which he always wanted to climb! Make this his best day!

GAMEPLAY

A- Move Left

D- Move Right

Spacebar - Jump

Fire IS touchable!

Reach the Flag at the end of a level to migrate to the next level.

GAME JAM

This Game was made in 5 days. The Jam is called Totally Ranked Jam, hosted by MGC Vlad.

The Game Jam topic was called "End of the world".
